abstract: HSBC, the biggest bank in Europe, plans to put about half of its 800 French consumer branches up for sale as it focuses on expanding in Asia and other emerging markets, according to press reports.
lead_paragraph: HSBC, the biggest bank in Europe, plans to put about half of its 800 French consumer branches up for sale as it focuses on expanding in Asia and other emerging markets, according to press reports.

headline.main: Tamping Down SocGen Chatter, HSBC Is Expected to Sell 400 Banks
